name: BlurBar
body:
BlurBar
=======================

Blur the iOS 7 statusbar on your homescreen. Uses private API exposed in [CKBlurView](https://github.com/conradev/CKBlurView). Special thanks to the many developers and friends who helped along the way.

**Available for download on the BigBoss repository, or [here](https://github.com/insanj/BlurBar/releases).**

![BlurBar](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/951011/1846024/377be990-75be-11e3-9286-0cce30b19221.png)


BlurBar is completely open source and free. If you want to use the code, make sure to follow the license below, and [feel free to e-mail me](mailto:me@insanj.com) about any problems. Enjoy!
